title: Grey mullet with langoustine ravioli, broad beans and micro cress
description: This dish will impress with the wonderful flavours of langoustine and mullet. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a pasta machine.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 10oz cooked langoustines, meat removed and sliced, shells reserved
300g/10½oz '00' pasta flour, plus extra for dusting
2 x 150-200g/5½-7oz fillets grey mullet (or another white fish), skin-on, pin-boned
